message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this unique product. I believe it has the potential to be incredibly valuable for your business. My initial offer is $1,750,000. Let's see if we can find a mutually beneficial agreement.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am only able to offer $1,400,000. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.
Bob, I understand your position and appreciate your interest. I'm willing to come down to $1,600,000,  which is still a good deal for both of us.  Let's see if we can bridge the gap.
Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I am willing to consider $1,550,000 as a fair price for the product. I hope this proposal works for you.
